snippet: SCOTTO--Michela "Mickey", 103, died Sunday, March 6, 2016 in New City, NY. Born December 3, 1912 on the island of Procida in Italy to Francesco and Lucia Scotto di Covello, Mickey moved with her family to America when she was nine and lived her entire life in Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn. She was the eldest sister of Ceasare and Anthony and was pre-deceased by her nephew, Frank Scotto, of South Nyack, NY. Mickey is survived by her grandnephews Jeffrey and Anthony and great-grandnephew Mason. Funeral services will be 9:30am, Wednesday, March 9, 2016 at St. Mary Star of the Sea in Brooklyn, NY. 1/3

Born December 3, 1912 on the island of Procida in Italy to Francesco and Lucia Scotto di Covello, Mickey moved with her family to America when she was nine and lived her entire life in Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn. She was the eldest sister of Ceasare and Anthony and was pre-deceased by her nephew, Frank Scotto, of South Nyack, NY. Mickey is survived by her grandnephews Jeffrey and Anthony and great-grandnephew Mason. Funeral services will be 9:30am, Wednesday, March 9, 2016 at St. Mary Star of the Sea in Brooklyn, NY. 1/3
